channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: China Sends Warplanes Near Taiwan After U.S. Warship Transits Taiwan Strait
item.description: China has sent 23 warplanes into territory around Taiwan after a U.S. guided-missile destroyer transited the Taiwan Strait.

item.title: Tsai Ing-wen's Path to the Presidency of Taiwan
item.description: President Tsai ing-wen will step down on May 20, marking an end to her eight years as Taiwan's president. TaiwanPlus looks back at her ascension to the country's highest seat of of

item.title: Survey Highlights Difficulty of Balancing Motherhood and Career in Taiwan
item.description: A new survey has found that working moms are more tired than ever. The realities of the modern Taiwanese workplace are beginning to weigh on women trying to balance a career and mo

item.title: Residents of Village in Kaohsiung Protest Terms of Relocation Order
item.description: Residents of a village in Kaohsiung are protesting the terms of a relocation order that they say gives insufficient compensation for houses of equal size to what they currently own
